title: unable to share root of custom mount
body:
### expected behaviour
i've added a custom mount (as admin) of a local directory. in the web gui i've logged in as admin and shared the custom mount (root) with another user. expected is the user to see the shared custom mount in shares/<name>.

### actual behaviour
in the shares folder of the other user a folder with no name has appeared. the name is missing in the link too.
sharing a folder within the custom mount works as expected.

### steps to reproduce
1. create a custom mount (local)
2. share the mount (root) with another user via the web gui
3. login as the other user and see the shares folder contains a folder with no name

### workaround
in table oc_share the field "file_target" has a value of "/", change this to "/<name>" and sharing works as expected.

### server configuration
operating system:
mythbuntu 12.04 lts

web server: apache 2.2.22-1ubuntu
database: mysql 5.5.31-0ubuntu0.12.04.1
php version: 5.5.31
owncloud version: 5.0.5

### client configuration
browser: firefox 20
operating system: kubuntu 13.04

### logs
#### web server error log
no entries

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
no entries

#### browser log
when the share is made, the ajax call returns status: success
a js error occurs:
typeerror: oc.share.statuses[itemsource] is undefined
